TopicTitle: comparing jili in a game with show and tell

Articles.Content:
Gili is one of my favorite companions and in show and tell he looked great, but now he seems paler and plainer. I think this is a +1 to the fact that developers have better textures. I tried to take 2 photos of the same place (probably) for comparison

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1133vBDdjVE8lT5u3uzFJwTDLE0F-M8vh/view?usp=share_link

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_YuXoZ3IO5Z_ZkMJNXjX182vhpKSABl2/view?usp=share_link
